title: Bug 17289: Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: Clicking on the first Combo does not make it take focus in the Photon version. However, if the combo list is dropped down, it will take focus.
EB: The first Combo should take focus when clicked on in the Photon version.
SR: To reproduce: Open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog. Press 'Tab' and the focus should go to the second Combo labeled 'Repository Path:'.
